1.1.name: wordpress/smart-arrow-shortcodes
1.1.description:
If you have a blog that requires giving instructions to users, like moving following Settings → General, this plugin is for you. Just put [arl] on [arr] in your post and it will replace them with ← and → respectively.

If you want have any questions or feature requests, please contact us via http://wpblogexperts.com/contact-us
